Posts.EditableText:
Hi guys, is it possible to change the style of the verbs for an object when using hyperlinks?

I am thinking instead of squares (drop down menu) around the word, something round, verbs side by side.  Something similar to Gruescript: 

https://versificator.itch.io/gruescript 

Thank you,
Posts.HTML:
Hi guys, is it possible to change the style of the verbs for an object when using hyperlinks?

I am thinking instead of squares (drop down menu) around the word, something round, verbs side by side. Something similar to Gruescript:

https://versificator.itch.io/gruescript

Thank you,
